19000811.en:
<voice 06976_19000811><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>That Intercontinental Rail Pass is a permit to use the
railroad. You'll need it if you want to cross the ocean.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000811.ja:
<voice 06976_19000811><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「その大陸間鉄道パスは
　鉄道に乗るための　許可証だ。
　海の向こうに渡るために　必要になる。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000811.ko:
<voice 06976_19000811><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 그 대륙간 철도 패스는
　철도를 이용하기 위한 허가증이다.
　바다 너머로 건너갈 때 필요할 터.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000811.zh-Hans:
<voice 06976_19000811><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>洲际铁路通行券是乘坐铁道列车的许可证。
是前往大海彼端的必需物品。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000811.zh-Hant:
<voice 06976_19000811><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>那個洲際鐵路通票
是乘坐鐵路所需的許可證。
前往海的彼端會需要用上它。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000812.en:
<voice 06977_19000812><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>You want to travel the world, don't you? The station is
located in town. Use the rail pass to explore the
world.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000812.ja:
<voice 06977_19000812><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「そなたは　世界を
　見て回りたいのであろう？　
　わが城下にも　その駅がある。使うがよい。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000812.ko:
<voice 06977_19000812><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 그대는 세계를
　돌아다니며 보려는 게지?
　나의 성 시가지에도 역이 있으니 쓰도록 하라.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000812.zh-Hans:
<voice 06977_19000812><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>你想周游世界，
到处看看吧？
我们城镇也有车站。你就尽管使用吧。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000812.zh-Hant:
<voice 06977_19000812><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>你想要周遊世界，
到處看看吧？
我們城鎮也有車站。你就儘管使用吧。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1157.en: <voice 07117_00001157><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>Minister Chigri, send a message immediately!<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1157.ja:
<voice 07117_00001157><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「チグリ大臣よ。
　すぐに　おふれを出せ！<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1157.ko:
<voice 07117_00001157><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 치그리 대신,
　지금 당장 내 명을 전해라!<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1157.zh-Hans:
<voice 07117_00001157><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>奇古力大臣。
请你马上下达布告！<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1157.zh-Hant:
<voice 07117_00001157><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>奇古力大臣。
請你馬上下達布告！<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1158.en:
<voice 07147_00001158><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>That says, 'I won't go to war with Gartlant! Everyone,
return to your daily lives!'<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1158.ja:
<voice 07147_00001158><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「ガートラントと　いくさは　やらん！
　皆　日々の暮らしに戻れ！　……とな。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1158.ko:
<voice 07147_00001158><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 가트란트와는 싸우지 않는다!
　모두 각자의 소임으로 돌아가라!……라고.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1158.zh-Hans:
<voice 07147_00001158><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>我国不会与加特兰德开战的！
大家都回到日常生活中去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1158.zh-Hant:
<voice 07147_00001158><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>我國不會與加特蘭德開戰！
大家都回歸日常生活中去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8070.ja: <voice 07304_00008070><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「かしこまりました！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8070.ko: <voice 07304_00008070><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 분부 받들겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8070.zh-Hans: <voice 07304_00008070><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>谨遵吩咐。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1160.en:
<voice 07447_00001160><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>If war had broken out, more blood would have been
spilled on the continent of Ogreed...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1160.ja:
<voice 07447_00001160><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「いくさが起きていれば
　多くの血が　このオーグリード大陸に
　流れるところであった……。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1160.ko:
<voice 07447_00001160><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 전쟁이 벌어졌다면
　이 오그리드 대륙에
　수많은 피가 흘렀을 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1160.zh-Hans:
<voice 07447_00001160><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>引发战争的话，
两国人民的鲜血就会染红奥古力德大陆……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1160.zh-Hant:
<voice 07447_00001160><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>要是引發戰爭，
這座奧古利德大陸
就會出現眾多犧牲……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1161.en:
<voice 07487_00001161><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>...I'm truly grateful. I'm relieved that the people
of Glen don't have to go through that...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1161.ja:
<voice 07487_00001161><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「……本当に　よかった。
　このグレンの民に　つらい思いを
　させずにすんで……。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1161.ko:
<voice 07487_00001161><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: ……정말 다행이군.
　그렌 국민들이 그런 고통을 겪지 않아서…….<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1161.zh-Hans:
<voice 07487_00001161><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>真的太好了。
没有给古莲的百姓带来灾难……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1161.zh-Hant:
<voice 07487_00001161><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>……真是太好了。
沒有給古蓮的百姓
帶來災難……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8071.en:
<voice 07637_00008071><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>And above all... You didn't allow your fellow ogres to
give in to an inescapable hatred of one another...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8071.ja:
<voice 07637_00008071><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>「そして　何より……
　オーガ同士に　取り返しのつかない
　憎しみ合いを　させずにすんで……。<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8071.ko:
<voice 07637_00008071><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>: 그리고 무엇보다도……
　오거끼리 돌이킬 수 없이
　서로를 증오하지 않아도 되어서…….<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8071.zh-Hans:
<voice 07637_00008071><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>更重要的是……
还好奥伽族同胞间
没有产生无法消弭的仇恨……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8071.zh-Hant:
<voice 07637_00008071><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>然後更重要的是……
奧伽彼此間沒有互相仇視，
做出不可挽回的事……<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

129929.en:
<voice 00060_00129929><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>This country is prepping for war with another Ogre
country, Gartlant, by recruiting brave warriors with
their Proof of Adulthood!<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129929.ja:
<voice 00060_00129929><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>「この国は　同じオーガの国である
　ガートラントとの　いくさを控え
　一人前の証を持つ勇士を　集めているところだ！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129929.ko:
<voice 00060_00129929><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>: 우리 나라는 같은 오거의 나라인
　가트란트와의 전쟁을 앞두고
　모험가의 증표를 지닌 용사를 모집하고 있다!<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129929.zh-Hans:
<voice 00060_00129929><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>这个国家正在准备和
同为奥伽之国的加特兰德开战，
为此正在征集拥有合格者的证明的勇士！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129929.zh-Hant:
<voice 00060_00129929><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>這個國家正在準備和
同為奧伽之國的加特蘭德開戰，
為此正在徵集擁有合格者之證的勇士！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>

129930.en:
<voice 00250_00129930><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>If you have Proof of Adulthood, I want you to become
a soldier of this country and fight alongside us!<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129930.ja:
<voice 00250_00129930><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>「もし　お前が　一人前の証を持っているなら
　この国の兵士となって　ともに戦ってほしい！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129930.ko:
<voice 00250_00129930><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>: 만약 모험가의 증표를 갖고 있다면
　우리 나라의 병사가 되어 함께 싸워다오!<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129930.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00129930><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>如果你持有合格者的证明，
希望你能成为这个国家的士兵和我们一同作战！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129930.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00129930><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>如果你持有合格者之證，
希望你能成為這個國家的士兵和我們一同作戰！<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>

129931.en:
<voice 00391_00129931><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>If you want to volunteer to be a soldier, go see
King Bagudo at Glen Castle! The castle's entrance is
just up these stairs.<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129931.ja:
<voice 00391_00129931><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>「兵士に志願するなら　グレン城におられる
　バグド王に　会いにいってくれ！
　城の入り口は　この階段をのぼりきった所だ。<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129931.ko:
<voice 00391_00129931><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>: 병사로 지원할 생각이라면
　그렌성에 계시는 바그드 전하를 뵈러 가라!
　성 입구는 이 계단 위에 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129931.zh-Hans:
<voice 00391_00129931><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>如果你志愿成为士兵，
就到古莲城去见巴古德王吧！
从这段楼梯上去就到城堡入口了。<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129931.zh-Hant:
<voice 00391_00129931><start_lip_sync n00023 _normal m00001>如果你志願成為士兵，
就到古蓮城去見巴古德王吧！
從這段樓梯上去就到城堡入口了。<stop_lip_animation n00023 CLOSE_MOUTH>
